Articles.Content:
I have seen several people having this same issue both with stock and modded instances of KSP on all platforms. I run 32 bit with a host of mods and also have this happen on my stock ksp before I added mods. mostly I run in half to eighth res due to the amount of mods I have

You load your game and the world is all wonky like your space port is under water (in one case i had). Or you build a ship and load to the launchpad only to find your ship is in x-ray mode and all the graphics are out of whack.

If you pause the screen go to settings and hit either accept or apply it will reload all the graphics... the only caveat is you can't do it inside the VAB/SPH. I've also noticed this happens sometimes when I am in windowed mode and for some odd reason my laptop looses focus on the window with KSP in a not responding status.

It's annoying but it's my minor fix for now and it may help others with this issue.
